content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** calls for japanese size 6/0 3 5 mm hook gauge says approximately 3 nets and 10 row in 10x10 cm swatch **yardage** * color 1 approx 150 g 214 29 meters 234 35 yards * color 2 approx 70 g 100 meters 109 36 yards previously released as 28-22 2 1 http //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/211s-40/ 2 http //www rakuten co jp/gosyo/461397/713923/870239/870784/
